ResponseRule.name: Igwe: 1st Office Visit. Igwe Alone
ResponseRule.description: Player returns to his office for the first time since having rescued Igwe. Igwe is there, alone. No Mikhaila. No January. Should only play if other major events like Dahl or Apex haven't happened. Igwe also offers the player a reward.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: 2nd Office Visit. Reward.
ResponseRule.description: On a return visit, Igwe has crafted more supplies for Morgan. Works almost anytime.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Office Visit. No Hope Of Escape
ResponseRule.description: Play during an office visit. Late game. There's no way for survivors to escape the station because no Dahl/Shuttle. Igwe doesn't want to die, and he also doesn't want his research to be lost. He's fighting over what to do.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Thanks For Grabbing Leitner's Connectome
ResponseRule.description: Final follow-up to Igwe's sidequest where he asked the player to retrieve some research data from his qaurters.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Fallback Office Loiter Comments
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe recently arrived in Morgan's office. A few comments if the player talks to him. Fallback pool of loiter comments that should work almost anytime, except post-Apex probably.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: ClickMe Comments, Just Rescued, Pre-Dahl
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe recently arrived in Morgan's office. A few comments if the player talks to him.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: ClickMe, SimLab Comments
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe recently arrived in Morgan's office. A few comments if the player talks to him. More mid-game. Forshadowing the use of the Sim-Labs and escape later. Mostly flavor.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: ClickMe Comments, No Hope of Escape
ResponseRule.description: No hope of escape follow-up comments. There's no way for survivors to escape the station. Igwe doesn't want to die, and he also doesn't want his research to be lost. He's fighting over what to do.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: ClickMe Comments, Leitner Neuromod
ResponseRule.description: Igwe comments if the player has an active quest to retrieve Leitner's (pianist) Connectome from his quarters.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: ClickMe, Apex is Here
ResponseRule.description: Comments if the player clicks to talk to Igwe. Current phase: The Apex has recently arrived at the station.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ January -- January's Priorities
ResponseRule.description: Player returns to the office for the first time since having rescued Igwe. Igwe is not alone. Dr. Igwe is talking to January as the player arrives. They will continue to talk until the end of the convo or if they notice Morgan approaching.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ January Interrupted
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe is talking to January and Morgan walked up in the middle or after.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ January About Morgan's Escape
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe and January. January exapaining how Morgan's escape was implemented.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ January -- Blow It Up
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe and January. Igwe is furious about January's plan. Could play as a visit, or ambiently between them as the player is hanging out. Should play post-apex arrival. Or at least subsequent to the player having seen his 2nd video.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: ClickMe, Follow-Up To Seeing Morgan Using Powers
ResponseRule.description: Follow-up convo after Igwe witness the player using alien powers.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Laments Dahl's Death
ResponseRule.description: Player returns and sees Igwe after having killed Dahl.

ResponseRule.name: Player Attacked Igwe 1st Time
ResponseRule.description: Player attacked Igwe or Mika in the office. Initial Response.

ResponseRule.name: Player Attacked Igwe -- Repeats
ResponseRule.description: Player attacked Igwe or Mika in the office.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Sees Some Aliens
ResponseRule.description: Morgan kited some aliens into the office.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Thanks Morgan for killing Dahl Operators
ResponseRule.description: Igwe is relieved if Morgan took out "rescue" Operators outside the office.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe Comment About Apex Vision
ResponseRule.description: If the player has recently had an Apex vision (or just had one in the office). Igwe comments.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Dahl Could Pilot the Shuttle For Us
ResponseRule.description: Backup convo in case Igwe tells Morgan about capturing Dahl in-person instead.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ Mikhaila About His Deluxe Suite
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe and Mikhaila. Talking about their rooms. Probably plays after igwe has given player his request find Gustav Leitner's connectom data.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ Mikhaila -- TranStar Stress
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe is talking to Mikhaila. This should only play PRE-DAHL. Wondering about help and Mik counters about TranStar's interests.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ Mikhaila -- Paraplexis?
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe is talking to Mikhaila. He's learned she has an ailment that should have disqualified her from service aboard the station.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ Mikhaila -- Volunteers.
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe is talking to Mikhaila. This should only play once what happens to the volunteers comes to light (prob after completing Mikhaila's "Father" Objective.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Overheard Convo w/ Mikhaila -- You Smoke?
ResponseRule.description: Dr. Igwe is talking to Mikhaila. They will continue to talk until the end of the convo or if they notice Morgan approaching. Play this if January is dead and Mik is alive the first time the player returns to office OR as a later filler convo.

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reacting to Self-Destruct Key Fabrication
ResponseRule.description: Igwe reacts to self-destruct key being activated (bad thing).

ResponseRule.name: Igwe: Reacting to Null Wave Fabrication
ResponseRule.description: Igwe reacts to Null Wave being fabricated (good thing).
